member.name: STORAGE_PHYSICAL_TOPOLOGY_DESCRIPTOR
member.summary: The STORAGE_PHYSICAL_TOPOLOGY_DESCRIPTOR structure is one of the query result structures returned from an IOCTL_STORAGE_QUERY_PROPERTY request. This structure describes storage device physical topology.

member.name: STORAGE_PHYSICAL_TOPOLOGY_DESCRIPTOR.Version
member.summary: Contains the size of this structure, in bytes. Set to sizeof(STORAGE_PHYSICAL_TOPOLOGY_DESCRIPTOR).

member.name: STORAGE_PHYSICAL_TOPOLOGY_DESCRIPTOR.Size
member.summary: Specifies the total size of the data, in bytes. Should be >= sizeof(STORAGE_PHYSICAL_TOPOLOGY_DESCRIPTOR).

member.name: STORAGE_PHYSICAL_TOPOLOGY_DESCRIPTOR.Node
member.summary: A node as specified by a structure.
